Verses: 1 pinbu Dhaaveedhu Karththarai Nokki: Naan Yoodhaavin Pattanangal Ondrile Poi Irukkalaamaa Endru Visaariththaan, Adharkuk Karththar: Po Endraar; Evvidaththirkup Pogalaam Endru Dhaaveedhu Kettadharku, Avar: Ebronukkup Po Endraar.
2 appadiye Dhaaveedhu Than Irandu Manaivigalaagiya Yesrayel Ooraalaana Aginovaamodum, Naabaalin Manaiviyaayirundha Karmel Ooraalaana Abigaayilodumkooda Avvidaththirkup Ponaan.
3 andriyum Thannodirundha Manusharaiyum Avargal Kudumbangalaiyum Koottikkonduponaan; Avargal Ebronin Sutroorgalile Kudiyerinaargal.

4 appozhudhu Yoodhaavin Manushar Vandhu, Ange Dhaaveedhai Yoodhaa Vamsaththaarinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal. Keeleyaathdhesaththu Yaabesin Manushar Savulai Adakkampanninavargal Endru Avargal Dhaaveedhukku Ariviththa Podhu,

5 dhaaveedhu Keeleyaathdhesaththu Yaabesin Manusharidaththil Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi, Neengal Ungal Aandavanaagiya Savulukku Indha Dhayavai Seydhu Avarai Adakkampanninapadiyinaale Karththar Ungalai Aaseervadhippaaraaga.
6 karththar Ungalaik Kirubaiyum Unmaiyumaai Nadaththuvaaraaga; Neengal Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhapadiyinaal, Naanum Indha Nanmaikkuththakkadhaaga Ungalai Nadaththuven.

7 ippodhum Neengal Ungal Kaigalaith Thidappaduththikkondu Nalla Sevagaraayirungal; Ungal Aandavanaagiya Savul Mariththapinbu, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Ennaith Thangalmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal Endru Avargalukku Solla Sonnaan.
8 savulin Padaiththalaivanaana Nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apner Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposeththai Maganaayeemukku Azhaiththukkondupoi,
9 avanaik Keeleyaaththinmelum Ashooriyarmelum, Yesrayelinmelum, Eppiraayeeminmelum, Benyameeninmelum, Isravelanaiththin Melum Raajaavaaginaan.

10 savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposedh Isravelinmel Raajaavaagirapodhu Naarpadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan; Avan Irandu Varudam Raajyabaarampanninaan; Yoodhaa Koththiraththaarmaaththiram Dhaaveedhaip Pinpatrinaargal.
11 dhaaveedhu Ebronile Yoodhaa Koththiraththinmel Raajaavaayirundha Naatkalin Lakkam Ezhu Varushamum Aaru Maadhamumaam.
12 nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apner Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposeththin Sevagaraik Koottikkondu Maganaayeemilirundhu Kibiyonukkup Purappattup Ponaan.

13 appozhudhu Seruyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaabum Dhaaveedhin Sevagarum Purappattuppoi Kibiyonin Kulaththandaiyil Oruvarukkoruvar Edhirppattu Kulaththirku Andhappakkaththil Avargalum Kulaththirku Indhappakkaththil Ivargalum Iranginaargal.
14 apner Yovaabai Nokki: Vaalibar Ezhundhu Namakku Munbaaga Silambam Pannattum Endraan; Adharku Yovaab: Avargal Ezhundhu Appadi Seyyattum Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposeththin Pakkaththirku Benyameen Manusharil Panniranduperum, Dhaaveedhudaiya Sevagarile Panniranduperum Ezhundhu Oru Pakkamaai Poi,
16 oruvar Thalaiyai Oruvar Pidiththu Oruvarudaiya Vilaavile Oruvar Pattayaththinaale Kuththi Orumikka Vizhundhaargal; Adhinaale Kibiyonilirukkira Andha Sthalam Elkaadh Asoorim Ennappattadhu.
17 andraiyadhinam Migavum Kadinamaana Yuththamaagi Apnerum Isravel Manusharum Dhaaveedhin Sevagaraal Muriya Adikkappattaargal.
18 ange Seruyaavin Moondru Kumaararaagiya Yovaabum Abisaayum Aasagelum Irundhaargal; Aasagel Veliyilirukkira Kalaimaangalil Ondraippola Vegamaai Odugiravanaayirundhaan.
19 avan Apneraip Pin Thodarndhu Valadhupuraththilaagilum Idadhupuraththilaagilum Avanaivittu Vilagaamal Thuraththikkonduponaan.
20 apner Thirumbip Paarththu: Nee Aasagel Allavaa Endraan; Avan: Naandhaan Endraan,

21 appozhudhu Apner Avanai Nokki: Nee Valadhu Pakkaththirkaagilum Idadhupakkaththirkaagilum Vilagi Vaalibaril Oruvanaip Pidiththu Avanai Urindhukol Endraan; Aasagelo Vidamaatten Endru Thodarndhuponaan.
22 pinnum Apner Aasagelai Nokki: Nee Ennai Vittuppo, Naan Unnaith Tharaiyode En Vettavendum? Pirpaadu Un Sagodharanaagiya Yovaabin Mugaththile Eppadi Vizhippen Endraan.

23 aanaalum Avan Vilagippogamaatten Endrapadiyinaal, Apner Avanai Eettiyin Pinpura Alaginaal Avan Vayitrile Kuththinaan; Eetti Mudhugile Purappattadhu Avan Angedhaane Vizhundhu Seththaan; Aasagel Vizhundhukidakkira Idaththile Vandhavargalellaarum Thariththu Nindraargal.
24 yovaabum Abisaayum Sooriyan Asthamikkumattum Apneraip Pin Thodarndhaargal; Kibiyon Vanaandhara Vazhikku Arugaana Keeyaavukku Edhire Irukkira Ammaa Medumattum Vandhaargal.
25 appozhudhu Apneraip Pin Sendra Benyameen Puththirar Ore Padaiyaagak Koodi, Oru Malaiyin Uchchiyile Nindraargal.

26 appozhudhu Apner Yovaabaip Paarththuk Kooppittu: Pattayam Eppodhum Sangaaram Pannikkondirukkavendumo, Mudivile Kasappundaagum Endru Ariyeero, Thangal Sagodhararai Vittup Pinvaangumpadikku Endha Mattum Janangalukku Sollaadhiruppeer Endraan.

27 adharku Yovaab: Indru Kaalame Neer Pesaadhirundheeraanaal Janangal Avaravar Thangal Sagodhararaip Pinthodaraamal Appozhudhe Thirumbividuvaargal Endru Dhevanudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endraan.
28 yovaab Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Janangal Ellaarum Isravelaith Thodaraamalum Yuththampannaamalum Nindruvittaargal.
29 andru Raamuzhudhum Apnerum Avan Manusharum Andharavelivazhiyaaip Poi, Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Pidhronai Uruva Nadandhu Thaandi, Maganaayeemukkup Ponaargal.
30 yovaab Apneraith Thodaraamal Janangalaiyellaam Koodivarachcheydhaan; Dhaaveedhin Sevagaril Paththonbadhuperum Aasagelum Kuraindhirundhaargal.
31 dhaaveedhin Sevagaro Benyameenarilum, Apnerin Manusharilum, Munnootrarubadhuperai Madangadiththaargal.

32 avargal Aasagelai Eduththu, Bethlegemilulla Avanudaiya Thagappan Kallaraiyile Avanai Adakkampanninaargal; Yovaabum Avan Manusharum Raamuzhuvadhum Nadandhu, Pozhudhu Vidiyumpodhu Ebronile Serndhaargal.
